catarsisLab.title: Catarsis Lab
catarsisLab.description: We developed a website for personal growth workshops, a space dedicated to offering workshops that allow exploring emotions.

payrollMate.title: Redux Payroll Mate
payrollMate.description: We developed an application that automates payroll calculations and generates payment slips, optimizing the payroll management process for employees.

vijalmar.title: Vijalmar
vijalmar.description: An application was developed to automate the counting of overtime hours and calculate their value, including surcharges, optimizing the payroll management process.

nataliaForero.title: Natalia Forero
nataliaForero.description: A website was developed for the Natalia Forero brand, where beachwear and swimwear collections are exhibited, and online sales of these products are managed.

soundBayHouse.title: Sound Bay House
soundBayHouse.description: A website was developed for the Sound Bay House brand, where the services offered by the recording studio are exhibited, and the online reservation of the recording studio is managed.

zaku.title: Zaku
zaku.description: A website was developed for the Zaku brand, where the products offered by the brand are exhibited, and online sales of these products are managed.
